* My
  Community

  + **[City Hall On-Demand](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/communications/page/city-hall-demand)**
  + [Upcoming City Events](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/special-events)



The City of Corinth MyCorinth mobile app features a business directory as a way to view all of your favorite Corinth businesses in one place! If you are a local business within the City of Corinth and would like to be added to the list, fill out the Business Directory Registration Form below!

[MyCity Business Directory page](https://claim.mycivicapps.com/business/start_finding_business)
